wireframe:
WEBSITE WIREFRAME
==================

Section 1: HERO
========================================
Layout: centered
Components: headline, subheadline, cta-primary
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: centered
  Desktop: centered
Spacing: large

Section 2: AUDIENCE
========================================
Layout: grid-3-column
Components: audience-cards, headings, descriptions
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: 1-column
  Tablet: 2-column
  Desktop: grid-3-column
Spacing: medium

Section 3: SERVICES
========================================
Layout: grid-3-column
Components: service-cards, icons, headings, descriptions
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: 1-column
  Tablet: 2-column
  Desktop: grid-3-column
Spacing: medium

Section 4: CASE-STUDIES
========================================
Layout: grid-2-column
Components: case-study-cards, results, testimonials
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: 1-column
  Tablet: grid-2-column
  Desktop: grid-2-column
Spacing: large

Section 5: TEAM
========================================
Layout: grid-3-column
Components: profile-cards, photos, credentials, bio
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: 1-column
  Tablet: 2-column
  Desktop: grid-3-column
Spacing: large

Section 6: VALUE-PROPOSITION
========================================
Layout: centered
Components: headline, benefits, icons
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: centered
  Desktop: centered
Spacing: large

Section 7: PROCESS
========================================
Layout: horizontal-steps
Components: process-steps, numbers, headings, descriptions
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: vertical
  Tablet: horizontal-steps
  Desktop: horizontal-steps
Spacing: large

Section 8: FAQ
========================================
Layout: accordion
Components: questions, answers
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: accordion
  Desktop: accordion
Spacing: medium

Section 9: CONTACT
========================================
Layout: split-form
Components: contact-form, contact-info, booking-cta
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: split
  Desktop: split-form
Spacing: large
